addr: The client is responsible for airfare and hotel for the instructor on 1on1 programs.. For group bootcamps, the instructor pays their own airfare and hotel.. Los Angeles, CA
title: Phone and Skype Coaching Program
desc: Email us at support@abcofattraction.com for more details ? ???? Perfect for Alumni students looking to get a maintenance tune-up and also great for new-comers looking to get a quick assessment on the current status of their game. ? We have several instructors on staff that are available for phone coaching. We can help you evaluate your current progress as well as assist you in developing a game plan for your pick up skillset. ? Each phone coahcing session is one hour. We also offer skype or an alternative form of communication upon request. ? ?? "Sarging with the Asian Playboy as an ongoing experience has really changed my life. The Bootcamps really hammer it out as far as your game goes, but getting nightly coaching periodically helps keep my game sharp. When you're in field, with the music blaring, people walking everywhere, and you anxiety building, it's really tough to tell what you're doing well and what you're not. It's just really helpful having a professional set of eyes evaluating you game"? - Kevin Feng
